channel.title: Space technology of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the space technology of the day.

item.title: Rohini Satellite 1
item.description: Rohini Satellite 1 or RS-1 is the first satellite successfully launched by India using indigenously developed rockets. After the launch on 18 July 1980 by a SLV rocket, India became the 7th country to have rocket launching capability. The satellite was spin-stabilised and provided data regarding the fourth stage of SLV rocket.
